name: The chest
description:
You are an adventurous peasant who stumbles across an ancient and mysterious chest, what are you going to do? Try to destroy it of course! (W,A,D)  to move, CLICK to attack. Talk to everyone you meet (E) , explore, switch to equip items (space), use items (S when equipped) and don't forget to have fun
Gather the necessary supplies and succeed in fulfilling an ancient destiny It's a sorta platforming RPG.

Guaranteed to have fun ... (not actually guaranteed :p)

Okay, so this is my biggest game yet I started earlier this month (though I've reused a whole bunch of stuff from some of my other projects to speed things up)

This is a very early version of the game ,  occasionally a glitch may pop up, espacially saving and loading games.  So if you like the concept and would love to see more plz leave a comment, support the game for more content. 

That's why the game is free, but supporting it will help getting it a long way
There is a mobile version ( android) on the google store ( early verion )
